repairedDockerfile:
#
# Docker image for variant tools
#
FROM    continuumio/miniconda3

MAINTAINER Bo Peng <bpeng@mdanderson.org>

RUN apt-get update && apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install swig gcc g++ build-essential bzip2 libbz2-dev libz-dev curl git vim libblas-dev liblapack-dev && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN	conda update python
RUN	conda install cython
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir numpy scipy tables
WORKDIR /home/bpeng
RUN     git clone http://github.com/vatlab/VariantTools  VariantTools

WORKDIR /home/bpeng/VariantTools
RUN     git fetch
RUN		git checkout v3
RUN     git pull
RUN     python setup.py install
